Class AeXMLDBQueueStorageProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.AeXMLDBObject

              org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.queue.AeXMLDBQueueStorageProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeQueueStorageProvider, IAeStorageProvider, IAeXMLDBStorage
public class AeXMLDBQueueStorageProvider
extends AeAbstractXMLDBStorageProvider
implements IAeQueueStorageProvider

A XMLDB implementation of a queue storage provider.
